ru_UA {
    Version { "2.0" }
    NumberElements {
        ",",
        "\u00A0",
        ";",
        "%",
        "0",
        "#",
        "-",
        "E",
        "\u2030",
        "\u221E",
        "\uFFFD",
        ",",
        "+",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "#,##0.00 \u00a4;-#,##0.00 \u00a4",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "HH:mm:ss z",
                "HH:mm:ss z",
                "HH:mm:ss",
                "HH:mm",
                "EEEE, d MMMM yyyy '\u0433.'",
                "d MMMM yyyy",
                "d MMM yyyy",
                "dd.MM.yy",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
